Florence Rooney

  1. Foster Name: Florence M.
  2. Foster Family: Rev. Amil A. and Georgia Oestreich
  3. Location of Family: Albion, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Albion, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 5
  7. Date of Birth: 1901-12-24
  8. Date of Death: 1952-02-06
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Florence M. Jackson
  11. Spouse Name: Arthur Pruitt Jackson
  12. Notes: Florence is listed as their daughter in the 1910 census.See also information on Findagrave.com re: Amil A. Oestreich.
  13. Source: Albion Argus (NE), 23 March 1907; 1910 United States Federal Census; Gravestone, Rose Hill Cemetery, South Haven, KS.
